text: Harpdog Brown (January 28, 1962 â€“ January 7, 2022) was a Canadian blues singer-songwriter and harmonica player. He was honored by the Maple Blues Awards in 2014. Brown died on January 7, 2022 in Alberta, Canada at the age of 59. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Canadian singer-songwriters Category:Canadian musicians Category:People from Edmonton
